turkish_example_sentence: Onlar bu güzel bahçede huzurlu bir atmosfer hissedeceklerdi.
english_example_sentence: They were going to feel a peaceful atmosphere in this beautiful garden.
russian_example_sentence: Они собирались почувствовать умиротворяющую атмосферу в этом прекрасном саду.
